effect.sun_moon: Inflicts regular damage. Grounds the target until it leaves battle. Ignores levitation effects and the immunity of flying-type Pokémon.
effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Inflicts regular damage. Grounds the target until it leaves battle. Ignores levitation effects and the immunity of flying-type Pokémon.
effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Inflicts regular damage. Grounds the target until it leaves battle. Ignores levitation effects and the immunity of flying-type Pokémon.

short_effect.sun_moon: Grounds the target, and hits even Flying-type or levitating Pokémon.
short_effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Grounds the target, and hits even Flying-type or levitating Pokémon.
short_effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Grounds the target, and hits even Flying-type or levitating Pokémon.

flavor_text.sun_moon: This move also hits opposing Pokémon that are in the air. Those Pokémon are knocked down to the ground.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: This move also hits opposing Pokémon that are in the air. Those Pokémon are knocked down to the ground.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: This move also hits opposing Pokémon that are in the air. Those Pokémon are knocked down to the ground.
